Articles.Content:
As I opened KSP today Steam prompted me to choose one of two saves before even starting the game. This never happens, usually the game starts and then I choose from a list - with a different layout. The message also stated that I must choose one or it would not start.

Both saves were yesterday 9:21pm, one local and one in the cloud. I chose the one in the cloud, but they were probably identical. When the game finally started I only had the file from yesterday, with everything I did since reverted

What would cause something like this? There was no crash or irregular exiting, and I had at least two sessions since yesterday.
